item.title: Broken insecure gate into park, 10th July
item.description:
Gate into park broken and cannot be locked. See 7254673 for previous request for repair on this v old wooden gate. To solve that problem yet another repair was made. Now yet another part of this gate has broken and it can no longer be secured at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Crescent, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All Road Markings Gone, 10th July
item.description:
The road markings leading to Genotin Road are completely gone. The Stop Line and ASL Lines are not visible, so drivers are driving in to ASL, leaving people on cycles with no safe refuge. This is a critical safety element and should be fixed immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Southbury Road, Southbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet
